How to Delete Your Account

  1. Open the app and navigate to the Settings screen.
  2. Tap on the Delete Account option to open the confirmation popup.
  3. You will be prompted to enter your Password to confirm the deletion.
  4. Enter your Password to confirm account deletion.
  5. Press the Yes button to confirm the account deletion.
  6. Your account will be permanently deleted.
